title: Killers Amongst Us: David Temple beloved coach, murderer? (part 4)
itunes:title: Killers Amongst Us: David Temple beloved coach, murderer? (part 4)
description:
Belinda Lucas Temple learns her husband is having an affair. This mother, eight months pregnant, is murdered in her Katy, Texas, home. Investigators begin to look for a suspect, but they don't have to look very far. Police argue her husband wants to get rid of her so he can marry his mistress, a teacher in the high school where he teaches.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
